      • misschance

        public float misschance​(BattleState gameState,
                        Combatant current,
                        Combatant target,
                        int attackbonus)
        Parameters:
        attackbonus - Bonus of the given any extraordinary bonuses (such as +2 from charge). Most common chances are calculated here or by the concrete class.
        Returns:
        A bound % chance of an attack completely missing it's target.
        See Also:
        Action.bind(float)

      • addchances

        public static float addchances​(float a,
                               float b)
        Returns:
        the chance of at least 1 out of 2 independent events happening, given two percentage odds (1 = 100%).

      • perform

        public boolean perform​(Combatant active)
        Description copied from class: Action
        Performs an action as the human player.
        Specified by:
        perform in class Action
        Parameters:
        active - Current unit.
        Returns:
        true if executed an action (successfully or not). Just return false if the player cannot use this action (AI-only).

        public java.lang.String getchance​(Combatant c,

                                  Attack a,
                                  BattleState s)
        Returns:
        An estimate of the chance of hitting an attack ("easy to hit").

      • getchance

        public java.lang.String getchance​(Combatant c,
                                  Combatant target,
                                  BattleState s)
        Returns:
        Same as getchance(Combatant, Combatant, Attack, BattleState) but predicts CurrentAttack.

      • setmaneuver

        public static void setmaneuver​(Strike m)
        Sets the current Maneuver which should be taken as context during the execution of this class. Since this class needs to be thread-safe this is backed by a ConcurrentHashMap in order to properly synchronize setting and clearing this for any given thread at the right time.
